Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Solar Panel^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 现在你已经开始了你在工程学上的冒险旅程。另外我建议你尽快制造出其他设备。
Texts.Eng: Now you've started the engineering path of your adventure. I suggest getting some other machines up soon!
Powered stations are a ^green;huge productivity booster^reset;. To start with, you'll need a ^orange;Solar Panel^reset; to produce energy. Build one on a ^orange;Power Station^reset;.
